mechanics.kill_priority: Low - Only kill if defending a node or clearing a node to cap.

Flags.interaction: 8.0 Second Cast Time (Interruptible by ANY damage)
Flags.mechanic: Must click flag game object (`Arathi Basin Banner`).
Flags.cap_timer: 1 Minute after assault to finalize cap.

Buffs.Berserking: Spawns at Farm/Stables/Houses. Increases damage dealt/taken.

Blacksmith.strategic_value: Critical. The central node allows rapid response. Top priority.

Lumber_Mill.strategic_value: High. Provides vision and slow-fall access to BS/Farm/Stables.

Gold_Mine.strategic_value: Low. Defensive nightmare. Only take if LM is lost.

combat_engagement.road_fighting: FORBIDDEN. Ignore enemies on roads unless they are flag cappers.
combat_engagement.chasing: FORBIDDEN. Do not chase enemies away from the node > 30 yards.

role_logic.Defenders: Stay at the flag. Do not leave the circle. Interrupt cappers.
role_logic.Attackers: Ride straight to the node. Ignore dismount attempts if possible. Clear node, cap, then defend.
role_logic.Roamers: Only move to reinforce a node that is being called out.

opening_move.name: BS/LM Objective Rush
opening_move.description: 1 Cap Stables. 14 ride to BS/LM. Do not stop for 'first blood' in the field.
opening_move.priorities: Secure Blacksmith > Secure Lumber Mill > Hold Stables.

mid_game.Winning (3 bases): DEFEND ONLY. Do not push Farm. Do not push Mine. Win on points.
mid_game.Losing (2 bases): Attack Blacksmith en masse. Ignore K/D ratio.

opening_move.name: BS/Farm Objective Rush
opening_move.description: 1 Cap Farm. 14 ride to BS. Overwhelm Blacksmith numbers.
opening_move.priorities: Secure Blacksmith > Secure Farm > Harass LM.

mid_game.Winning (3 bases): DEFEND ONLY. Hold the Iron Triangle (Farm/BS/LM).
